amendment.description: An amendment numbered 7 printed in Part B of House Report 115-712 to provide $24 million for construction of critical infrastructure in NNSA, with an offset from NNSA Federal Salaries and Expenses.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Rogers (AL) amendment (A041) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A041) offered by Mr. Rogers (AL).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Rogers (AL) amendment (A041) Agreed to by voice vote.
